programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: Keep Calm And Curry On
programme.desc: When Beatles fans Charlotte and Erik decided to exchange with one Sandy McCartney from London, they were in for a shock when Sandy turned out to be an Indian boy. They try to get rid of the nerdy know-it-all, but Sandy might just be a blessing in disguise.

programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.title: The Exception
programme.desc: Four women working at an NGO investigating war crimes are shaken when two of them receive death threats. While they Initially blame a Serbian war criminal, their suspicions turn on each other when a case of bullying in the office escalates.

programme.title: Hippocrates
programme.desc: Benjamin dreams of being a great doctor, but his internship at his father’s ward doesn’t turn out the way he hoped. His experience as a junior doctor, with its overwhelming responsibility and stiff competition, forces him to confront his limits and fears.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sébastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: El Alamein – The Line of Fire
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of searing daytime heat and chilling nighttime cold, three-time Italian Academy Awards winner Enzo Monteleone paints a gritty, powerful WW II epic of the Italian army’s battle with the Germans to drive Allied Forces from North Africa.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 5: Let It Go
programme.desc: Despite political pressure to close the case and managing to avoid fingerprint detection, Shelly is put in a precarious position when descriptions from new witnesses threaten to implicate her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 6: Silent Mouth
programme.desc: The pressure builds on all fronts as Jason tries to close the case. Will Shelly be able survive as the pressure builds? The one option closed to her is to flee - she would never leave her children.

programme.title: Draupadi
programme.desc: Draupadi’s disrobing scene from the timeless epic, Mahabharat, is being shot on a film set. The male director, in the name of art, pushes his boundaries blurring the line between fiction and reality.

programme.title: Rival
programme.desc: 9-year-old Roman follows his mother Oksana, an illegal nurse in Germany. Oksana falls in love with 62-year-old Gert who tries to befriend Roman. While spending an afternoon alone with Roman, Gert suddenly dies of a heart attack, leaving Roman alone.

programme.title: Ghost Mountaineer
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, a group of Estonian students go hiking in Siberia. After their unpopular leader Olle vanishes, his rival Eero leads the group to seek help, and a series of bizarre and terrifying events unfold.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.
